attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public.
attributes.additional_details:
It’s 5th November and because organised public displays have been banned it seems every man and his dog have bought fireworks and it’s like living in a war zone.
Dogs are barking and I am at my wits end with all the noise.
It’s ridiculous. My mental health is fragile enough with what’s going on in England at the moment but I want to go out and scream at everyone. It’s driving me crazy.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
